name: M-nvm
tagline: Node Version Manager For MinGW Git Bash - Simple bash script to manage multiple active node.js versions on Windows
body:
## Welcome to M-nvm 
M-nvm is a fork from the original nvm, which does not work on Windows platform.  M-nvm makes a minimalist's change to the original nvm code so that you can easily manage your nodejs versions from a bash prompt in Windows.  

Currently only MinGW32 works.

## Usage

1. clone this repository
2. source the nvm.sh file
3. begin nvm-ing ;)

## Acknowledgement
this project is forked from @creationix/nvm, many thanks to the authors of nvm.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
